timeline.message: change the style of the lock information in the complaints view to avoid confusion

timeline.bodyText:
I think you can merge this lines and prevent a lot of duplicated code as you are using the *ngIf only to differentiate the translation strings. You can place the conditional operator inline with the translation string ({{ (isComplaint ? 'artemisApp.assessment.assessmentLockedComplaintView' : 'artemisApp.assessment.assessmentLocked') | translate}}) and keep *ngIf="!isAssessor" on the spanelement.
If I see this correctly, the id (id="assessmentLocked") is not used anywhere either. So you can remove it.
